channel.title: Please Read This Small Problems.. Need Help! 317 Server
channel.description: I Got 317 server source and i don't know how to make shops?? some people told me something u go to shops.cfg and add 2 2 or 2 1 or 1 2 and add items in shop and i did that then i went to autospawn.cfg and the npc made it was in the area i wanted and i tryed trading or talking to him all he does is kick/dissconcet me out of the game and please show the codes i can use thank you... and btw i need someone to run my server 24/7 thank you pls dont flame
